鬗鬗鬗

鬗字的基本解释

鬗
mán
（头发）长（ch俷g ）的样子。

鬗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mán］
［《廣韻》母官切，平桓，明。］
［《廣韻》無販切，去願，微。］
长貌。

鬗字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　鬗； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1456第26
【廣韻】【集韻】?無販切，音萬。【說文】髮長也。【前漢·禮樂志】掩回轅鬗長馳。【註】鬗鬗，長貌。　又【廣韻】謨官切【集韻】【韻會】母官切，?音瞞。義同。

鬗字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鬗字的起名意思

暂无。

head ornaments
Basic explanation of words
head ornaments
mán
(Hair) looks long (ch俷g).
head ornaments
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [mán]
["Guangyun" mother official cut, Pinghuan, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" no sales cut, go to wish, micro. ]
Long-looking.
head ornaments
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji Chapter 1】【髟字部】　鬗; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 1456 26
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? No sales cut, thousands of sounds. [Said the text] The hair is long. 【Former Han·Liyuezhi】Hidden back to the wind and long chi. 【Note】Huai, long appearance.　[Guangyun] Moguan cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Muguan cut,? Yin concealed. The same meaning.
